member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions
member.summary: Defines options when using a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_NON_VOLATILE
member.summary: This key is not volatile; this is the default. The information is stored in a file and is preserved when the system is restarted.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_VOLATILE
member.summary: All keys created by the function are volatile. The information is stored in memory and is not preserved when the corresponding registry hive is unloaded.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_CREATE_LINK
member.summary: This key is a symbolic link. Registry symbolic links should only be used for for application compatibility when absolutely necessary.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyOptions.REG_OPTION_BACKUP_RESTORE
member.summary: If this flag is set, the called function attempts to open the key with the access required to backup or restore the key.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities
member.summary: A helper class to compute differences between two versions of a text or a text file. Implements 'An O(ND) Difference Algorithm and its Variations" by Eugene Myers Algorithmica Vol. 1 No. 2, 1986, p 251'. Based on the work found at http://www.mathertel.de

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffTextFiles(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Find the difference in two text files, comparing by text lines.
member.param: A-version of the file (usualy the old one)
B-version of the file (usualy the new one)
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.DiffTextFiles(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Find the difference in two text files, comparing by text lines.
member.param: A-version of the file (usualy the old one)
B-version of the file (usualy the new one)
When set to true, all leading and trailing whitespace characters are stripped out before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all whitespace characters are converted to a single space character before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters are converted to their lowercase equivivalence before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters between words and non words characters are deleted before the comparation is done.
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.summary: Find the difference in two texts, comparing by text lines.

B-version of the text (usualy the new one)
member.returns: A list of differences.

member.param: A-version of the text (usualy the old one)
B-version of the text (usualy the new one)
When set to true, all leading and trailing whitespace characters are stripped out before the comparation is done.

member.summary: This function converts all textlines of the text into unique numbers for every unique textline so further work can work only with simple numbers.
member.param: the input text
This extern initialized dictionary is used for storing all ever used textlines.
ignore leading and trailing space characters
When set to true, all characters are converted to their lowercase equivivalence before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all whitespace characters are converted to a single space character before the comparation is done.
When set to true, all characters between words and non words characters are deleted before the comparation is done.
member.returns: a array of integers.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.SMS(CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32,CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is the algorithm to find the Shortest Middle Snake (SMS).
member.param: sequence A
lower bound of the actual range in DataA
upper bound of the actual range in DataA (exclusive)
sequence B
lower bound of the actual range in DataB
upper bound of the actual range in DataB (exclusive)
member.returns: a MiddleSnakeData record containing x,y and u,v

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffUtilities.LCS(CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32,CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DiffData,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is the divide-and-conquer implementation of the longes common-subsequence (LCS) algorithm. The published algorithm passes recursively parts of the A and B sequences. To avoid copying these arrays the lower and upper bounds are passed while the sequences stay constant.
member.param: sequence A
lower bound of the actual range in DataA
upper bound of the actual range in DataA (exclusive)
sequence B
lower bound of the actual range in DataB
upper bound of the actual range in DataB (exclusive)

members.member: Scan the tables of which lines are inserted and deleted, producing an edit script in forward order. dynamic array

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.XmlLineInfoDocument.CreateXmlDeclaration(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an node with the specified values.
member.param: The version must be "1.0".

The value of the encoding attribute. This is the encoding that is used when you save the to a file or a stream; therefore, it must be set to a string supported by the class, otherwise fails. If this is null or String.Empty, the Save method does not write an encoding attribute on the XML declaration and therefore the default encoding, UTF-8, is used. Note: If the XmlDocument is saved to either a or an , this encoding value is discarded. Instead, the encoding of the TextWriter or the XmlTextWriter is used. This ensures that the XML written out can be read back using the correct encoding.
The value must be either "yes" or "no". If this is null or String.Empty, the Save method does not write a standalone attribute on the XML declaration.

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags
member.summary: Defines options for a job object.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.DieOnUnhandledException
member.summary: Forces a call to the SetErrorMode function with the SEM_NOGPFAULTERRORBOX flag for each process associated with the job.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.BreakawayOk
member.summary: If any process associated with the job creates a child process using the CREATE_BREAKAWAY_FROM_JOB flag while this limit is in effect, the child process is not associated with the job.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.SilentBreakawayOk
member.summary: Allows any process associated with the job to create child processes that are not associated with the job.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.KillOnJobClose
member.summary: Causes all processes associated with the job to terminate when the last handle to the job is closed.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.JobObjectLimitFlags.SubsetAffinity

member.name: T:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights
member.summary: Defines specific access rights for registry key objects.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_QUERY_VALUE
member.summary: Required to query the values of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_SET_VALUE
member.summary: Required to create, delete, or set a registry value.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_CREATE_SUB_KEY
member.summary: Required to create a subkey of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_ENUMERATE_SUB_KEYS
member.summary: Required to enumerate the subkeys of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_NOTIFY
member.summary: Required to request change notifications for a registry key or for subkeys of a registry key.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_CREATE_LINK
member.summary: Reserved for system use.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_WOW64_64KEY
member.summary: Indicates that an application on 64-bit Windows should operate on the 64-bit registry view. This flag is ignored by 32-bit Windows

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_WOW64_32KEY
member.summary: Indicates that an application on 64-bit Windows should operate on the 32-bit registry view. This flag is ignored by 32-bit Windows

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.DELETE
member.summary: The right to delete the object.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.READ_CONTROL
member.summary: The right to read the information in the object's security descriptor, not including the information in the system access control list (SACL).

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.WRITE_DAC
member.summary: The right to modify the discretionary access control list (DACL) in the object's security descriptor.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.WRITE_OWNER
member.summary: The right to change the owner in the object's security descriptor.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_EXECUTE
member.summary: Equivalent to KEY_READ.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_READ
member.summary: Combines the STANDARD_RIGHTS_READ, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, KEY_ENUMERATE_SUB_KEYS, and KEY_NOTIFY values.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_WRITE
member.summary: Combines the STANDARD_RIGHTS_WRITE, KEY_SET_VALUE, and KEY_CREATE_SUB_KEY access rights.

member.name: F:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.RegistryKeyRights.KEY_ALL_ACCESS
member.summary: Combines the STANDARD_RIGHTS_REQUIRED, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, KEY_SET_VALUE, KEY_CREATE_SUB_KEY, KEY_ENUMERATE_SUB_KEYS, KEY_NOTIFY, and KEY_CREATE_LINK access rights.

member.name: M:CodeFluent.Runtime.Utilities.DataBindingEvaluator.Eval(System.Object,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Evaluates data-binding expressions at run time.
member.param: The object reference against which the expression is evaluated. This must be a valid object identifier in the page's specified language.

The navigation path from the container object to the public property value to be placed in the bound control property. This must be a string of property or field names separated by periods, such as Tables[0].DefaultView.[0].Price in C# or Tables(0).DefaultView.(0).Price in Visual Basic.
A .NET Framework format string (like those used by String.Format) that converts the Object instance returned by the data-binding expression to a String object.
member.returns: A String object that results from evaluating the data-binding expression and converting it to a string type.

The format provider.

Methods were called after the stream was closed.
